data.comment: The match has started.
In West Bromwich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Chelsea at The Hawthorns.
Free kick Chelsea.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 4, Goal! West Bromwich have got their heads in front thanks to a Callum Robinson strike.
Matheus Pereira instrumental with a fine assist.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Chelsea.
In the minute 7, Mason Mount (Chelsea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 8, Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) has received a yellow card from Jon Moss.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Chelsea drives forward and Kai Havertz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Chelsea's Marcos Alonso gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Matheus Pereira for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 11, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In West Bromwich Chelsea attack through Tammy Abraham. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 13, Jon Moss signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Chelsea apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Timo Werner. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Chelsea.
Chelsea have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Mason Mount for Chelsea drives towards goal at The Hawthorns. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for West Bromwich, close to Chelsea's area.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 23, Chelsea pushes forward through Timo Werner, whose finish on goal is saved.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's now 2-0 in West Bromwich as Callum Robinson scores for West Bromwich.
In the minute 27, West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 27, Goal! West Bromwich extend their lead to 3-0 through Kyle Bartley.
That's a fine assist from Darnell Furlong.
Reece James for Chelsea has been booked by Jon Moss and receives a first yellow card.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Can West Bromwich capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 37, Reece James gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Chelsea are coming forward and Tammy Abraham gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jon Moss awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 42, Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Grady Diangana of West Bromwich gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jon Moss awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Grady Diangana (West Bromwich) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chelsea's Mateo Kovacic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 45, Chelsea needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 45, Jon Moss blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Cesar Azpilicueta is replacing Marcos Alonso for the away team.
In the minute 46, Callum Hudson-Odoi is replacing Mateo Kovacic for Chelsea at The Hawthorns.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Chelsea close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in West Bromwich.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 53, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Mason Mount keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 55, Great play from Cesar Azpilicueta to set up the goal.
Kai Havertz of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 57, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 59, West Bromwich's Callum Robinson breaks free at The Hawthorns. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in West Bromwich.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Chelsea drive upfield and Callum Hudson-Odoi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Mason Mount (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Jon Moss signals a Chelsea throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Hal Robson-Kanu is on a sub for Callum Robinson for West Bromwich.
Chelsea push forward at The Hawthorns and Mason Mount gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 68, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Chelsea.
West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 70, Chelsea are back in the match in West Bromwich. Callum Hudson-Odoi has scored to make it 3-2.
Kai Havertz with an assist there.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for West Bromwich close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
The away team replace Thiago Silva with Olivier Giroud.
In the minute 74, West Bromwich make their second substitution with Matt Phillips replacing Grady Diangana.
Romaine Sawyers for West Bromwich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
In West Bromwich Chelsea drive forward through Cesar Azpilicueta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In West Bromwich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In West Bromwich, Hal Robson-Kanu of West Bromwich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 79, Matt Phillips (West Bromwich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 82, West Bromwich's Darnell Furlong has been booked in West Bromwich.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 83, Chelsea will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from West Bromwich.
It's a goal kick for the away team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 86, Jon Moss signals a Chelsea throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Christensen (Chelsea) gets a yellow card.
Chelsea's Timo Werner gets in a shot on goal at The Hawthorns. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea drive upfield and Timo Werner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-3.
The home team have replaced Matheus Pereira with Sam Field. This is the third substitution made today by Slaven Bilic.
Goal! The away team draw level at 3-3 through Tammy Abraham.
